properties.entry: INSERT INTO sc_warehouse_order ( ORDER_ID, ORDER_ITEM_ID, QUANTITY, REAL_ID, REAL_SKU, STATUS ) VALUES ( '{@#order-id#}', '{@#order-item-id#}', '{@#quantity-to-ship#}', '{@#realId#}', '{@#realSku#}', 1 )

SELECT s1.REAL_SKU,s1.REAL_ID FROM sc_real_product_rel s1 , sc_amazon_order s2 WHERE s1.SKU = s2.SKu AND s1.account_id = s2.account_id AND s2.order_id = '{@#order-id#}' AND s2.order_item_id = '{@#order-item-id#}'

SELECT s1.*,s2.PAYMENTS_DATE,s2.SKU, (SELECT NAME FROM sc_amazon_account WHERE id = s1.account_id ) AS CHANNEL_NAME FROM sc_warehouse_order s1, sc_amazon_order s2 WHERE s1.status = 1 AND s1.order_id = s2.order_id AND s1.order_item_id = s2.order_item_id AND s1.account_id = s2.account_id and s1.real_id = '{@#id#}'
